name: Sociabble
slogan: THE EMPLOYEE ADVOCACY AND INTERNAL ENGAGEMENT HUB
description:
Sociabble is a software company dedicated to delivering top of the line enterprise social media solutions for Employee Advocacy, Social Selling, Internal Communications, and Brand Advocacy.
Launched in 2014 by a team of experienced entrepreneurs in digital asset management technology, social media and content marketing, Sociabble is currently used in over 80 countries.
Our technology platform is supported and developed by technical teams with over 20 years of experience in software application development.

Headquartered in Paris France, Sociabble has operations in New York City, London, Lyon, and Mumbai.

Sociabble is currently used in over 80 countries and has acquired some of the world’s most prestigious clients such as, BNP Paribas, Coca-Cola, Deloitte, Microsoft, Renault, and The Walt Disney Company. Hundreds of thousands of people use Sociabble all over the world on a daily basis, many of them have become great ambassadors and truly engaged employees.

jobs.title: Sales Development Representative
jobs.description:
What if companies had truly informed, engaged, and influential employees?

This is the challenge that Sociabble decided to take up in 2014, by launching an SAAS platform for Internal Communication, Employee Advocacy, and Employee Engagement.

5 years later, Sociabble is used in more than 80 countries, by companies such as Coca-Cola, Disney, Microsoft, BNP Paribas, L’Occitane, and Renault.

The company is headquartered in Paris, with R&D in Lyon, and additional offices in London, New York and Mumbai. Sociabble has been international since day one, with a multicultural team.

Sociabble was founded by two pioneers of the Internet, Jean-Louis Bénard and Laurent Gauthier, entrepreneurs and investors for more than 25 years, who in building the company, were inspired by the best of U.S.-based SAAS platforms, without being constrained by the caricatures or culture of Silicon Valley start-ups. Sociabble is identified by U.S. analysts as one of the best solutions on the market today.

Simplicity, kindness, respect, exemplarity, fairness, and trust are the values ​​around which the company has developed. The teams consist of a mix of experienced and junior professionals, to facilitate day-to-day learning through mentoring.

 

Our proposal?  

You support the Sociabble International Sales Department by searching out potential leads and qualified sales opportunities, which you then bring to the attention of an Account Executive.

This position is a great opportunity to implement the prospecting “best practices” commonly used by the leaders of Silicon Valley.
• Development of leads that have downloaded white papers on our website, or have participated in our events. Nurturing prospects who have not yet reached the right degree of maturity.
• Identification of possible sales opportunities, selection of appropriate contacts, qualification of potential leads.
• Making appointments with qualified contacts for Account Executives.
• Implementation of Social Selling techniques, including the use of the LinkedIn Sales Navigator.
• Advanced use of CRM, including personal campaign management.
• Collaboration with marketing teams for the creation of support materials to facilitate outbound contact, and the preparation of targeted prospecting campaigns.

 

Your profile?

• You have successful sales experience
• You speak and write fluently in English
• You have excellent interpersonal skills, both written and spoken, and you know how to be persuasive
• Speaking on the phone with people you do not know does not scare you, no matter who you are talking to
• You have excellent priority management
• You are able to identify business opportunities by interacting with your contacts
• You are very comfortable in innovative environments and with new technologies
• Your desire to progress causes you to challenge yourself, and to help us progress with you
 

Important information before applying:

One or more interviews may be offered after the first appointment by phone, upon selecting your profile.
A test to highlight the skills related to the mission may also be offered during the recruitment process.

jobs.title: Account Manager (M/F) US Market
jobs.description:
What if companies had truly informed, engaged, and influential employees?

This is the challenge that Sociabble decided to take up in 2014, by launching an SAAS platform for Internal Communication, Employee Advocacy, and Employee Engagement.

5 years later, Sociabble is used in more than 80 countries, by companies such as Coca-Cola, Disney, Microsoft, BNP Paribas, L’Occitane, and Renault.

The company is headquartered in Paris, with R&D in Lyon, and additional offices in London, New York and Mumbai. Sociabble has been international since day one, with a multicultural team.

Sociabble was founded by two pioneers of the Internet, Jean-Louis Bénard and Laurent Gauthier, entrepreneurs and investors for more than 25 years, who in building the company, were inspired by the best of U.S.-based SAAS platforms, without being constrained by the caricatures or culture of Silicon Valley start-ups. Sociabble is identified by U.S. analysts as one of the best solutions on the market today.

Simplicity, kindness, respect, exemplarity, fairness, and trust are the values ​​around which the company has developed. The teams consist of a mix of experienced and junior professionals, to facilitate day-to-day learning through mentoring.


OUR PROPOSAL ?

In charge of ensuring that the customer experience runs smoothly, you will be their designated contact; you will be at their side and advise them throughout the implementation of their projects, and in the achievement of their objectives.

This position, which is a great opportunity to learn and evolve in a digital, dynamic, and friendly environment, is organized around two main axes, defined as follows:


Guidance and advice to our customers:

Develop a relationship of trust with project managers and sponsors (communication department, marketing, HR, etc.)
Help to build the “success plan” of projects, beginning with the implementation of the solution,continuing through the project’s duration
Facilitate “Customer Success” training sessions and workshops
Follow the project on a monthly basis by being proactive with your customers, sharing good practices and feedback
Renew and grow your customer portfolio
 

Project management:

Manage the project’s launch schedule by ensuring a timely deployment
Coordinate relationship with internal technical teams during deployment
Monitor the project in “run” mode to ensure the achievement of the client’s objectives
Represent your customers with the Product Team to develop new features
Participate in the implementation of transversal projects aimed at improving the internal organization of the Customer SuccessTeamat Sociabble.


YOUR PROFILE ?

You have a taste for new technologies, the world of SAAS and digital transformation. You enjoy teamwork and want to practice in a constantly changing environment.

You want to participate in an adventure and grow with Sociabble, working with world-renowned companies to ensure their satisfaction with their projects.

You have an affinity for internal communication, social networks, and community management.


IS THIS POSITION FOR YOU ?

A university graduate (with a focus in commercial, digital, or engineering fields), your previous experiences in related positions (Customer success, engagement consultant, change management consultant, Account Manager) have given you the social and technical tools for performing in a fast pace environment with C-level renowed clients. You’re now looking for a job that feels more like an adventure and want to get involved in ambitious projects with real responsibilities.

You have excellent relationship-building and interpersonal skills that allow you to adapt easily to different interlocutors (HR Director, Director of Communication, etc.). You are thoughtful and attentive, which enables you to understand the needs of your clients. You have a great sense of service, a good sense of analysis and synthesis. You are pro-active, rigorous, organized, and have an eye for details. Enthusiastic and curious, you have a taste for challenge and a desire to work in a constantly changing environment.



Important information before applying:

One or more interviews may be offered after the first appointment by phone, upon selecting your profile.
A technical test to highlight the skills related to the mission may also be offered during the recruitment process.

jobs.title: Sales Account Executives (Senior / Junior) English natives
jobs.description:
What if companies had truly informed, engaged, and influential employees? 

This is the challenge that Sociabble decided to take up in 2014, by launching an SAAS platform for Internal Communication, Employee Advocacy, and Employee Engagement. 

5 years later, Sociabble is used in more than 80 countries, by companies such as Coca-Cola, Disney, Microsoft, BNP Paribas, L’Occitane, and Renault. 

The company is headquartered in Paris, with R&D in Lyon, and additional offices in London, New York and Mumbai. Sociabble has been international since day one, with a multicultural team. 

Sociabble was founded by two pioneers of the Internet, Jean-Louis Bénard and Laurent Gauthier, entrepreneurs and investors for more than 25 years, who in building the company, were inspired by the best of U.S.-based SAAS platforms, without being constrained by the caricatures or culture of Silicon Valley start-ups. Sociabble is identified by U.S. analysts as one of the best solutions on the market today. 

Simplicity, kindness, respect, exemplarity, fairness, and trust are the values ​​around which the company has developed. The teams consist of a mix of experienced and junior professionals, to facilitate day-to-day learning through mentoring. 

It is in the Sales team that** 2 positions are vacant (1 senior / 1 junior)**:


**Our proposal? **  

Become a key member of the Sociabble International Sales Department by developing our clients portfolio thanks to the pipeline of inbound leads. 

This position is a great opportunity to learn and grow within a digital, dynamic and friendly environment. Your aim is to close deals, by handling the full sales cycle, from identifying business opportunities, structuring, negotiating, and closing complex sales agreements.  

 
• Become an expert on the ins-and-outs of Sociabble and lead qualification and demo meetings with C-level prospects. 

•  Engage with the prospect’s organization at all the necessary levels and ensure our value proposition is fully communicated and understood within all necessary teams of complex organizations (multinationals, subsidiaries, franchises, etc.) 

• Strategically manage and track customer information, activities, pipeline metrics and accurate forecasts in a CRM system. 

• Collaborate with all teams regarding billing, legal, security, and technical integration.  
 

This position is focusing on inbound sales, however, if you are interested in outbound and prospection methods, we are open to personalize your scope for you to bloom at Sociabble. 

For the senior position, and depending on your evolution and your interests, you can expect to manage juniors once handling the Sales perfectly yourself. 


**Your profile? **

• You have successful sales experiences (min. 2 years) and a natural sales instinct.  

• You speak and write perfectly in English (native or bilingual with sales experience on US and UK clients) 

• Active listener, empathic, extremely clear, timely and accurate, you have excellent interpersonal skills, both written and spoken.  

• You know how to be persuasive no matter who you are talking to, especially by mastering strategic business topics 

• You have excellent priority management 

• You are able to identify business opportunities by interacting with your contacts 

• You are very comfortable in innovative environments and with new technologies 

• Your desire to progress causes you to challenge yourself, and to help us progress with you 


**What’s in for you ? ** 

A truly empathic culture, where everyone’s ideas are listened to and given a chance.  
A progressive level of autonomy 
Constant learning and sharing, with passionate people! 
A great balance between structure and flexibility 
Transparency  
Flat hierarchy structure  

Amazing office location in the historical Marais district in Paris (3rd)
Multi-national culture  
Meal voucher, transportations support

jobs.title: Digital Project Manager -  SaaS (Eng/Fr)
jobs.description:
Sociabble was founded by two pioneers of the Internet, Jean-Louis Bénard and Laurent Gauthier, entrepreneurs and investors for more than 25 years, who in building the company, were inspired by the best of U.S.-based SAAS platforms, without being constrained by the caricatures or culture of Silicon Valley start-ups. Sociabble is identified by U.S. analysts as one of the best solutions on the market today. 

Simplicity, kindness, respect, exemplarity, fairness, and trust are the values around which the company has developed. The teams consist of a mix of experienced and junior professionals, to facilitate day-to-day learning through mentoring. 

 It is in the Consulting team that a position is vacant: 

 

Bilingual Digital project Manager - SaaS (M/F)

  

  

**Notre proposition ?**

Au sein de la Direction Conseil, vous êtes garant du bon déroulement du projet et de la satisfaction de vos clients en France et à l’international. Vous serez en charge de la mise en place de la plateforme et de l’onboarding des différents acteurs du projet côté client, en vous appuyant sur une méthodologie éprouvée incluant une série de workshops avec le client. Vous construirez également le planning et assurerez le suivi et le reporting du projet. Vous accompagnerez les clients tout au long de la vie de leurs projets dans l’analyse de leurs résultats et les conseillerez dans l’usage opérationnel des outils de la plateforme Sociabble.
Pour chaque projet client, vous travaillerez avec le Customer Success Manager en charge du compte client, qui accompagnera votre évolution et vous guidera dans la démarche stratégique permettant l’atteinte des objectifs du client.

Ce poste, qui constitue une vraie opportunité d’immersion et d’évolution dans un environnement digital, dynamique et convivial, s’articule comme suit :

•    Développer une expertise sur des sujets de change management, de stratégie de communication et d’engagement collaborateur
•    Organiser le planning de lancement du projet en assurant le déploiement dans les temps
•    Coordonner l’implémentation technique du projet, entre le client et l’équipe technique Sociabble
•    Animer des formations et workshops opérationnels sur l’usage de la plateforme
•    Garantir une proximité entre Sociabble et le client par des points de contact mensuel
•    Analyser les résultats de chaque projet client et identifier les axes d’amélioration
•    Etablir le reporting statistique mensuel de performance des projets et proposer des recommandations d’usage
•    S’assurer de la bonne connaissance par les clients des solutions proposées par Sociabble pour répondre à leurs objectifs et résoudre leurs problématiques
•    Participer à la mise en place de projets transverses visant à améliorer les bonnes pratiques et la méthodologie projet.


**Votre profil ?**

Vous êtes passionné par les nouvelles technologies, le monde de la communication et de la transformation digitale. Vous aimez le travail d’équipe et souhaitez exercer dans un environnement en constante évolution.
Vous souhaitez participer à une aventure et grandir avec Sociabble auprès d’entreprises mondialement reconnues pour assurer leur satisfaction sur leurs projets.
Vous avez une affinité pour la communication interne, les réseaux sociaux et l’animation de communautés.

Ce poste nécessitant une posture de conseil auprès des clients français et internationaux, il nécessite un niveau bilingue parfait anglais-français pour la bonne réalisation des missions.


**Cette offre vous correspond ?**

Issu d’une formation d’ingénieur, commercial, digital, vous avez excellé plusieurs années en gestion de projet dans le digital ou dans la communication. Vous êtes à la recherche d’un emploi à forte responsabilité couplée d’une liberté d’initiative et souhaitez-vous impliquer dans un projet ambitieux.

Vous êtes pro-actif, rigoureux et avez le sens du détail. Vous êtes organisé et savez gérer plusieurs projets à la fois. Vous avez un excellent relationnel qui vous permet d’être à l’aise et de maintenir un bon contact auprès de vos clients. Vous êtes à l’écoute et attentif ce qui vous permet de comprendre les besoins de vos clients. Vous avez un grand sens du service, un bon esprit d’analyse et de synthèse et êtes à l’aise avec les chiffres. Enthousiaste et curieux, vous avez le goût du challenge et désir de travailler en équipe dans un environnement en constante évolution.
 

**Les plus de Sociabble à Paris? **

•    Le bureau de Paris est situé dans un ancien hôtel particulier construit avant la révolution française, avec deux magnifiques terrasses pour travailler à l’extérieur
•    2 séminaires internes annuels de 4 jours sont organisés à Paris rassemblant l’ensemble des collaborateurs pour partager les meilleures pratiques et construire l’avenir.
•    Des outils logiciels à la pointe pour supporter tout le suivi client au-delà de la CRM, notamment une solution de Customer Succes Management et une Digital Adoption Platform.
•    Une forte proximité avec les équipes produit, marketing et vente, ainsi qu’avec le top management. La possibilité d’apprendre auprès de profils expérimentés.
•    Sociabble se développe sur un modèle de croissance raisonnée, auto-financée, ne perd pas d’argent. 
•    Nombreux sports pratiqués par les collaborateurs. Courses à pied en semaine le midi (il y a des fans de running et de trail). Douche disponible dans les bureaux.

• 2 séminaires internes annuels de 4 jours sont organisés à Paris rassemblant l’ensemble des collaborateurs pour partager les meilleures pratiques et construire l’avenir.
• Des outils logiciels à la pointe pour supporter tout le suivi client au-delà de la CRM, notamment une solution de Customer Succes Management et une Digital Adoption Platform.
• Une forte proximité avec les équipes produit, marketing et vente, ainsi qu’avec le top management. La possibilité d’apprendre auprès de profils expérimentés.
• Sociabble se développe sur un modèle de croissance raisonnée, auto-financée, ne perd pas d’argent.
• Nombreux sports pratiqués par les collaborateurs. Courses à pied en semaine le midi (il y a des fans de running et de trail). Douche disponible dans les bureaux.
